'''Lucky Coin''' is a currency used in the [[Genius Invokation TCG/Card Shop|Card Shop]] for [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

There is a limit of 20,000 Lucky Coins that the player can hold at a time; reaching this limit will prompt the player that the challenge objectives cannot be completed and the corresponding rewards cannot be gained, although the Adventure Challenges and Duels may still be played. If the player has less than 20,000 Lucky Coins, then earns Lucky Coins from challenges and exceeds the limit, the extra Lucky Coins will not be lost.
